A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Poorly written.  Terrible continuity.  Bad dialogue.  A complete missed opportunity.  I can't believe there was a plot plan in place\, or at least followed\, before Episode 7 was written.  I watched a 2+ hour chase scene with a thin plot with no depth and almost no character development.  So disappointing.  I had high hopes after seeing Rogue One.
